title: Springfield Falcons announce 2015-16 promotional schedule
text:
Springfield Falcons announce 2015-16 promotional schedule Falcons Promotional Schedule.jpg Members of the Westfield Jr. Bombers at the game between the Albany Devils and the Springfield Falcons on Friday, April 3, 2015 at the MassMutual Center. The Falcons announced their 2015-16 promotional schedule on Thursday. (DAVID MOLNAR / THE REPUBLICAN) (Staff-Shot) 
The Springfield Falcons announced today the team's early season promotional schedule. Additional promotions and theme nights will be released at a later time. The early season promotional schedule features appearances by Wally the Green Monster, Pat Patriot, Patriots cheerleaders, and Rene Rancourt. In addition, promotional nights will be built around the release of Stars Wars: Episode VII and Batman vs. Superman; Dawn of Justice. The 2015-16 Springfield Falcons Promotional Schedule is as follows. Saturday, October 10 - Home Opener Block Party and Magnet Schedule GiveawayFriday, October 16 - Youth Baseball Night with Wally the Green MonsterFriday, October 23 - Military Appreciation NightFriday, October 30 - Halloween Party at the NestSaturday, November 21 - Youth Football Night with Pat Patriot and Cheerleaders Scout Sleepover on the IceSaturday, November 28 - Teacher Appreciation NightFriday, December 4 - Hometown HeroesFriday, December 11 - Star Wars NightSaturday, December 19 - Rene Rancourt National Anthem PerformanceSaturday, January 9 - Faith and Family NightSunday, February 14 - Valentine's Day at the NestSunday, February 21 - Hockey Weekend Across America and Skate with FalconsSunday, March 6 - Girls and Women in Sports DaySaturday, March 12 - GSL JamboreeSunday, March 20 - Superhero Night and GSL Parade of Champions Promotions and event dates are subject to change. Consistent promotions listed below. Falcon Fridays Every Friday, whether the team is home or not, will be deemed Falcon Friday. Fans are encouraged to wear Falcons gear on Fridays to show their enthusiasm for our hometown team. Submissions of pictures can be made to all social media channels to show their dedication to the team. When the Falcons play home on Fridays, special activities and deals will be announced during the course of the season. Sunday Family Fun Day Every Sunday home game will include a post-game skate for all fans. UNO Pizzeria and Grill is presenting a "Family Pack" for all Sunday games that includes three tickets and one large pizza for just $49. Fans can purchase the pack through the Falcons website, at the Falcons front office, or by calling 413-739-GOAL(4625). The package must be purchased the Friday before at 5:00 p.m. Winning Wednesdays For all Wednesday home games, when the Falcons win, you win! Any fan in attendance will receive a complimentary ticket to a select home game if the Falcons win in any of the three Wednesday contests.
